title: Starting Out With C++ From Control Structures thrugh Objects 7th
description:
Starting Out With C++: From Control Structures through Objects, 7th Edition (c2012), textbook by Tony Gaddis.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/product?ISBN=9780132576253" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/product?ISBN=9780132576253</a>
(current edition: 8th c2015)

CONTENTS:
---------
1. Introduction to Computers and Programming
2. Introduction to C++
3. Expressions and Interactivity
4. Making Decisions
5. Loops and Files
6. Functions
7. Arrays
8. Searching and Sorting Arrays
9. Pointers
10. Characters, C-Strings, and More About the String Class
11. Structured Data
12. Advanced File Operations
13. Introduction to Classes
14. More About Classes
15. Inheritance, Polymorphism, and Virtual Functions
16. Exceptions, Templates, and the Standard Template Library (STL)
17. Linked Lists
18. Stacks and Queues
19. Recursion
20. Binary Trees
APPENDICES
 A: Getting Started with Alice
 B: The ASCII Character Set
 C: Operator Precedence and Associativity

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (60 mb; a very bad case of font embedding but it's free...)
compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.
